name: Om
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, my Super BFF!! 🎉🎂 Yayyyyy! 🥳🎈 Many, many happy returns of the day! 🎉 I’m so lucky to have you in my life—you're not just my best friend, you’re family, my partner in crime, and the one who knows me better than anyone else. 💖 From the time we met in vidyalankar ⏰ to our epic late night convos ⏰, every moment with you is an adventure. 😂 Those are the moments that make our friendship so special. 💫Here’s to more memories, more inside jokes, and a lifetime of support and love. You make my life brighter and better just by being in it! 🌟 Let’s celebrate YOU today and always. Wishing you all the happiness, success, and love in the world, because you deserve nothing less. 💙🎁 Enjoy every second of your special day, and here's to another year of being absolutely amazing together! 🥂💫  Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Happy Birthday, Cutie! 🎉🎂🎈I’m so incredibly lucky to have you in my life. Every moment we share, whether it’s laughing until we can’t breathe or those quiet, real conversations, fills my heart with so much love. You’ve been my rock, my joy, and my constant. I’m beyond grateful for you, today and always. Here's to many more years of love, laughter, and memories.Enjoy your day, Pilu! 🍻💙Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Love you more than words can say.
